data.title: Creative director

data.text:
The Creative Director is a title inside the Haus of Gaga since the beginning in 2008. Matthew Williams had this position from 2008 to 2010. Laurieann Gibson was the creative director from 2010 with her project being the director of the HBO special Lady Gaga Presents The Monster Ball Tour at Madison Square Garden and finishing in 2011 after working with Gaga and the Haus on various music videos. Laurieann Gibson's relationship with Gaga came to an end after 'creative differences' and false claims.
